comment: Smart Data models -Waste Water Plant schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.WasteWater/master/WasteWaterPlant/schema.json
description: Data model for waste water treatment plant.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: bod
contents.comment: Biological Oxygen Demand concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: cod
contents.comment: Chemical Oxygen Demand concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: do
contents.comment: Dissolved oxygen measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: inFlow
contents.comment: In-flow amount into the treatment plant/reservoir corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: nh4
contents.comment: Ammonium concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: no3
contents.comment: Nitrate concentration measured in waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: observationDateTime
contents.comment: Last reported time of observation.

contents.name: outFlow
contents.comment: Out-flow amount into the treatment plant/reservoir corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: po4
contents.comment: Ortho-phosphate concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: redox
contents.comment: Reduction potential or oxidation measured in waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tic
contents.comment: Total Inorganic Carbon concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: tn
contents.comment: Total Nitrogen concentration measured in waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: toc
contents.comment: Total Organic Carbon concentration measured in the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: treatmentPlantCapacity
contents.comment: Handling capacity of the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: treatmentPlantCode
contents.comment: Unique code for the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: treatmentPlantId
contents.comment: Unique identification number for the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: treatmentPlantName
contents.comment: Name of the waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: tss
contents.comment: Total suspended solids concentration measured in a waste-water treatment plant corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address

contents.name: municipalityInfo
contents.comment: Municipality information corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: pHTSA
contents.comment: Acidity level or basicity level observed in the water. Object defining the temporal processing of the magnitude property during a period. It provides maximum, minimum, instant value and average
